Author: Sonata.ai
Title: ‚úÖ [ANN] [ICO] Sonata.ai - crypto exchange with long-term profit
Body: The market is changing, but it's change for the better. Crypto is finally becoming part of a globally accepted, adult market. Up until now, cryptocurrencies were often gray zone matter. Many conservative traders were waiting to jump in exactly for this reason. We believe, that if the mainstream crypto space is fully regulated, we will be even closer to a mass adoption. Once all the legal work in all big countries is done, we expect that crypto will finally lose the public label of "money for pedofiles, technocrats and gamblers" and there will be even bigger need for our product. Good times are coming.

Author: Sonata.ai
Title: ‚úÖ [ANN] [ICO] Sonata.ai - crypto exchange with long-term profit
Body: First few batches of token listing will be based on votes (as promised in our white paper). Only later we will introduce hybrid listing system based both on voting (popular tokens will be listed) & fee payment (other tokens can be listed for a fee). Before the actual launch, our platform will have a thorough third-party security audit. Also, we are already working closely with security experts. Assets of the users will be as safe as they can be.    Thank you for your questions, if you want to know more, feel free to ask. We will be happy to explain everything.

Author: Sonata.ai
Title: ‚úÖ [ANN] [ICO] Sonata.ai - crypto exchange with long-term profit
Body: Thank you for this question! These are early estimates. The market is ever-evolving and so are trading fees. Be sure that we will do our best to provide really competitive prices. Not the lowest, but for sure lower than average. Main reason why we don't want to go on minimum is because it's not sustainable state and we want to provide sufficient rewards for SONT token holders.  As for your previous question: Sonatacoin.cz has a monthly volume in tens of thousands of USD, so it is a really small exchange in every meaning of that word. Please, be aware that this is fiat -> crypto & crypto -> fiat exchange. Also we didn't focus on the marketing, because this product was basically a playground for us.

Author: Sonata.ai
Title: ‚úÖ [ANN] [ICO] Sonata.ai - crypto exchange with long-term profit
Body: Great question! As you probably know yourself, this is hot topic of the last few months. First of all, we are in the process of acquiring corresponding licence on Malta. We will be offering our security tokens legally. Currently, we are using a legal loophole and we offer our tokens only to carefully selected institutional investors. Second of all, we would like to take a bite out of the market ourselves. We plan to provide sale of a security tokens of other subjects on our platform. We believe that ICOs can in long-term replace IPOs for startups and medium-sized companies. To be honest, this is daily topic in our company and I feel like we have already spent too much time on it with our lawyers. And there is a lot more of work to do, if we are to stay ahead of the competition. Hope I've mentioned all important information.

Author: Sonata.ai
Title: ‚úÖ [ANN] [ICO] Sonata.ai - crypto exchange with long-term profit
Body: www.sonata.ai                             White paper                                       About the product There are far too many crypto exchanges on the market. Crypto exchanges that would have all features user would expect? A different story. Our project is built for cryptocurrency enthusiasts and backed by experts in the field. Join us. More information ‚Üí        About SONT token Why the hell would you buy yet another token? Simple answer: because our token will regularly reward you even if you just hold it.  ----------------------------- ----------------------------- Token symbol SONT Token standard ERC20 Total token supply 500,000,000 Total tokens for sale 250,000,000 Currencies accepted BTC, ETH, LTC Hardcap $21,000,000 Value of token 1 SONT = $0.1 Token sale date October 8, 2018 -----------------------------   Benefits for holders SONT token allows us to share our profit with you. Owners earn 80% from the fees and receive the reward on regular basis. We consider it fair to reward the individuals who believed in our platform and took part in our offering.  If we look on current crypto exchanges and apply our business model we can see interesting numbers: Imagine you will pay 1 BTC for our SONT tokens and Sonata.ai will have daily trading volume of $400,000,000. In this situation you might get a passive income of up to 0.47 BTC every month. Example above serves for an illustrative purpose only and is by no means meant as a promise. More information ‚Üí      Margin trading income Lend your coins to margin traders and raise the value of your crypto assets risk-free. Sonata's sophisticated pairing algorithm will ensure the maximum reward possible. More information ‚Üí    SONT tokens for trading Even when you are trading, you earn with us. As long as we have tokens to distribute, you will get them free for each trade you will make on our exchange. More information ‚Üí     Sale phases and bonuses We don‚Äôt have time limits for the ICO, simply because our investor is providing all funds needed for development of initial platform. Sale is divided into four phases, limited by amount of tokens provided for each phase. The earlier you buy, the larger bonus we will give you.  ----------------------------- ---------------------------------- Sale phases Tokens available Bonus Private sale 100,000,000 SONT -- Public sale 1 30,000,000 SONT 15% Public sale 2 50,000,000 SONT 10% Public sale 3 70,000,000 SONT 5%   More information at www.sonata.ai

Author: Tata011
Title: ‚úÖ [ANN] [ICO] Sonata.ai - crypto exchange with long-term profit

Author: Sonata.ai
Title: ‚úÖ [ANN] [ICO] Sonata.ai - crypto exchange with long-term profit
Body: Hello Tata011, thank you a lot for all three of your questions. Let's open a bit about our inner workings and plans.  The company claims that it will be different from other similar projects, but how? Sonata.ai will actually work the way an exchange traders would expect. If you ever used Forex trading tools as a daily routine, you already know that most of crypto exchanges got the core functionality wrong. This is what we will do differently. We believe that we have a excellent business model, great mixture of functions and that Sonata.ai will be more than just a sum of everything. Please have a look on our white paper to find all differences in features section. Do you know any other (currently available) exchange that can offer exactly what we do, including how our tokens is used? Let us know!   What is new to protect your customers from fraud? First of all, there is no such a thing as an impenetrable system that would protect all customers from a fraud. But let me name a few of our things that distinguish us from others: We are directly backed by an investor with 24 years experience in finance industry. Solidni finance a.s. is easily searchable, has a reputable history and a clean slate. We have history in cryptocurrency, albeit a short one. We have already created small fiat - crypto exchange for Czech market. Although it is no wonder, it can still be a clear proof that we can deliver a product. Sonata.ai will be developed whether you decide to invest or not. We will show the progress of our work to insiders and public. It will be only up to you if you find our project interesting enough. There is clear equation: the earlier you will invest, the bigger bonus in tokens and higher risk. The later you will invest, the closer we will be to an actual platform, so you can see what you will invest to.   How many tokens do you need to purchase to replenish your ranks? Work on the exchange is in progress as we speak. On the other side, it is true that we plan to grow bigger if we see positive reaction of general public. Solidni finance a.s. invested $4,000,000 to make this happen. If we sell tokens with this value, we have green light to assemble a team with full potential. That will effectively help us to deliver all promises we have made so far.  Hope I have answered everything. If not, please feel free to ask more!

So If I would sell/buy 1 BTC I`ll  pay 0.01 BTC fees (=64$ at this moment)? Isn`t this too large fees for the exchange transaction regarding the existing competitors fees?
